channel.title: Mac Client Error
channel.description:
everything works fine, its just when i log onto the server, i get errors when i double-click something. this is the error [code]Run: line 3: 23637 Segmentation fault [b]java -Xmx512m EGUI[/b] logout [/code]
any ideas?
The text in bold is how the Run.bat/Terminal looks like
